titles: The burthen of tyre A sermon preach'd at Pauls Crosse, by Iohn Grent, then fellow of New Colledge in Oxford.
author: Grent, John.
publisher: Printed [by A. Mathewes] for Richard Royston,
notes: A variant of the edition with Grismand's name in imprint.
Identified as STC 12360a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
